title: Add api.airforce models: Imagen 3 & Grok Imagine Video
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Integrates api.airforce to bring Google Imagen 3 and xAI Grok Imagine Video models to the platform.
gist.impact: Creators gain access to top-tier image generation and new video capabilities with transparent pricing.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations Bee taking to the skies (representing 'api.airforce') to deliver new capabilities. The Bee is a pilot, emphasizing the new provider's name, delivering 'Imagen' and 'Grok' packages.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations Bee wearing aviator goggles, flying a tiny retro biplane through fluffy pastel clouds. The plane is delivering two glowing crates labeled 'Imagen' and 'Grok'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender sky gradient. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like a friendly delivery mission in a retro game. Emotionally warm, nostalgic but beautiful.
